trans-unit.source: Enables upgraded Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebClass" name="WebClass" href=""></xref> projects to run in [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].
When a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], it is converted to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.
Declarations are added to your project: one for the `WebClass` and one for each of the `WebItems` and `Templates` in the `WebClass` project.

A `Page_Load` event procedure is added to the project, creating first a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass> object and then `WebItem` objects for each of the `WebItems` and `Templates` associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project.
Finally, in the `Page_Load` event procedure, you will see a call to the `WebClass` Compatibility runtime: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass.ProcessEvents%2A>.
This enables the runtime to render the WebItem specified in the Request URL.
This code is the only new code added to your upgraded project and only serves to emulate the underlying behavior of the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` runtime.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref> class.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.

A <xref:System.String> that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> property for the Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebClass" name="WebClass" href=""></xref> object.
The <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass"></xref> object that contains this <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref>.
Optional.

The file name of a Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Template" name="Template" href=""></xref> that was associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebItem" name="WebItem" href=""></xref>.
Gets the name that is used in code to identify a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref> object.
Read-only.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the name for the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref> object.
Gets or sets a value that determines whether to rescan for tokens that are contained within replacement text.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text should be rescanned; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the string that is used to prefix replacement tag names in an HTML template.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.
A <xref:System.String> that identifies the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TagPrefix" name="TagPrefix" href=""></xref> sequence used to recognize replacement tags in an HTML template.
Processes an HTML template attached to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebItem" name="WebItem" href=""></xref> object and returns it to the browser.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.
A <xref href="System.Web.HttpResponse"></xref> object.
Optional.

The file name of a Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Template" name="Template" href=""></xref> that was associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebItem" name="WebItem" href=""></xref>.
